item.title: Introducing myself
item.description: Who am I? My name is Johannes Ptaszyk. I located and born in Bottrop, Germany and I identify as european. Also I identify as the following: Software developer Political being Nature lover Music lover What do I do? Currently I am working as a Junior in the Android development team at G Data Software AG. I recently joined the german party Bündnis 90/Die Grünen to bring some new ideas to the german politics. What is this website about? Mostly about me and my experiences and thoughts. I am currently planing multiple sections and over time I might add more and more. The main section will be the blog, where I will mostly write about technical stuff (e.g. Android Development or Hugo). This section will be mostly english. There will be another section in the future where I write about politics that will most likely be written in german. And then I plan on a third one that will be mostly creatvitiy related stuff like music, art or creating different kinds of things. Here I will have some german and some english posts depending on the topics. Thank you Thank you for reading this small introduction about myself. I am looking forward to seeing comments on my posts and maybe I can even provide some useful stuff to you!
